summary: Utility module that supplies generic helpers for dynamic importing, optional dependency handling, and version validation. It defines custom exceptions for missing optional packages and insufficient PyTorch versions, provides functions to retrieve package and type information, compare version strings, and automatically load submodules of a package.
business_intent: Enable the MONAI library to gracefully manage optional thirdâ€‘party packages and enforce minimum version requirements, while allowing its own components to be discovered and loaded at runtime without hard dependencies.
